overview: Oprosko, CFO, has more than 20 years of experience as a financial management leader. He has extensive knowledge in the financial services, manufacturing and gaming industries. Throughout his career Oprosko has served as a consultant, as well as a leader, for multiple organizations including API Inc, E3 Environmental and McGladrey Pullen. Oproskoâ€™s background also includes training/development in the areas of fraud awareness, internal controls and the Bank Secrecy Act.
